110  /* Each Slave in the system has a unique 32-bit ID. This
111  * request is forward to the lowest level Slave device in
112  * the tree which will service the Transaction for this Master. This
113  * allows the system to determine which memory Masters shared the
114  * same address space.
115  *
116  * Exposed to python as _reqSlaveId()
117  * @return 32-bit Slave ID
118  */
119  uint32_t reqSlaveId();
120 
122  /* Each Slave in the system has a unique name. This
123  * request is forward to the lowest level Slave device in
124  * the tree which will service the Transaction for this Master. This
125  * allows the system to determine which memory Masters shared the
126  * same address space.
127  *
128  * Exposed to python as _reqSlaveName()
129  * @return Slave Name
130  */
131  std::string reqSlaveName();
